nodes.title: Change Item registry's hash map size from 16 to 512.
Remove org.bouncycastle libraries to reduce filesize significantly.
Add warning for turning off online-mode
Made player join after having sent the chunks
Switch to thread-per-world design for ticking
Added dummy getKiller() methods for bukkit.
Entity spawn code and basic chicken class
Updated for bukkit changes + calling some more events now
Storage of a ton of stuff, and some other tweaks.
Fixes for the changes in bukkit, a ban system + api, and a few more events called
Added sky/fog colors from Spout's SkyManager
Added configuration getters for the latest Bukkit
Fix for block placement and breaking with damage values
Changed digging to use BlockProperties, added sound effects to it
Fixed the packet id of PlayEffectCommand
Writing world data and minecraft.net name authentication
Added the mob spawning code from CraftBukkit
Added support for spawning lightning bolts
Added support for executing commands at the server console
Made digging a little more realistic. Also added BlockBreak and DamageEvents.
[WIP] Adding multiple classes for the different mobs (passive/hostile/neutral)
Check for creative and sword on break (fixes #349)
Add Eclipse project name to build.gradle
Add Eclipse and IDEA plugins to build.gradle
Moving scripts to the bottom of page
Handle invalid arguments with a warning only
Move code for block rotation out of BlockSign
Config option to turn off spawn chunk persistance
Add note about Trello to CONTRIBUTING.md
Toggle between normal and inverted daylight sensor on interact
Add bare bone implementations for some Entities
Do the proper command for publish
Center website on screens with enough space
Fix disconnect when sending empty chunks
Added Hay, Log, Quartz, Ladder, Vine
Open windows for all block's that have an inventory type.
Open windows for all block's that have an inventory type.
Config option to turn off spawn chunk persistance
Config option to turn off spawn chunk persistance
Display crafting table inventory as it's supposed to instead of a chest
disable block breaking in creative holding sword
Rogue threads are completely obliterated now
Open blocks (fence gates, trap doors) with right click
Added CONTRIBUTING.md based on original drafts
Let the player drop the (whole) ItemStack in his hand with (Ctrl+)Q
Replace Bukkit API dependency with MIT-licensed alternative
Skylight in empty chunks should be 15, versus 0
Limits yaw to values > 0 and < 360. Fixes #173
Correct Facing Direction for chests & stairs & slabs
Revamp login logic and fix multiple players being able to log in.
fix makes gradle work for me.
Added Java 1.5 Override annotations where required
Implements 1.8 codecs (0x41 up to 0x49) Partially completes #131
Allow placement of blocks overriding tallgrass and fire.
Support BungeeCord player data on connect
Update README with a Kiwi IRC link.
Make blocks with non-standard drops drop the correct items
START_DIGGING==FINISH_DIGGING for blocks that break on first hit. Fixes #629
Fix new worlds starting off with thundering rain
Updated GlowLightningStrike to damage living entities and ignite them... (Fixes #203)
Allow using Glowstones Io utils without requiring a world
Travis: route builds to their new infrastructure and enable caching
Fixed console check on headless environments
Add a note about using the forums for support
[WIP] Add some structures and their NBT storage
Parse JSON when loading sign text NBT
[WIP] Fixed problems with adding air to player inventory
Do not reassign entity ids on world changes / respawns
Drop attached blocks when the block it's attached to is destroyed by a player.
Fix the player 'joining' when they should be kicked
Fixes player joining game before being kicked for whitelist/ban/full
Fix placement issues with red sandstone stairs / slabs
Alow setting and sending of a resource pack to players
Fire PlayerItemHeldEvent when player switches held item
Fix Hoe interaction with coarse dirt and podzol
Only drop items if the player mined with the needed tool
Added method blockDestroy to BlockType class
Implemented door placement and door handling (See #119)
Farming blocks placement check and drops
Add huge mushrooms and simple tree generator
Add a script that fetches glowkit PRs for travis
Show current held item and equippment to other players
Prevent time out when main thread is blocked
Make offline players fetch their UUID from Mojang if the server is in online mode
Convert strings to int and boolean when migrating from the server.properties
[WIP] Fix drops for blocks that should break instantly
Fix downloads page not working due to jquery loading after the script
Fixed Player.isOnline() returning true when the player isn't already log...
Spawn the player next to the bed instead of inside it
